Summary: Orange Glowing Burst and small flashing objects in sky
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Perris
There were no other sightings in Perris on or around June 10th 2013
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi was outside in front of my home with my husband, just sitting in our driveway looking at the flashing\blinking lights in the sky as always. i was trying to tape the blinking objects in front of me in the sky, towards the right. when out of know where, on my left i saw a huge bright glowing ball that just appeared and kind of descended in a downward position. after the glowing ball appeared i saw planes or helicopters or something in the sky. it was crazy..
